actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to quitclaim any interest of the United States in and to certain real property in Sandoval County, New Mex., to the record owner of such property.

summary.text: Requires the release and quitclaim of any interest of the United States in and to specified real property in Sandoval County, New Mexico, to the record owner of such property.

titles.title: A bill to quitclaim any interest of the United States in and to certain real property in Sandoval County, New Mex., to the record owner of such property.
